text: Julien Simon-Chautemps (born 14 May 1978) is a race engineer of the Sauber Formula One team.F1: Simon-Chautemps signe chez Sauber He graduated from Institut polytechnique des sciences avancées.Devenir ingénieur en F1 avec IPSA == References == Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:French racecar drivers Category:Formula One people Category:Alumni of the Institut polytechnique des sciences avancées
title: Julien Simon-Chautemps
